title: Badlands Baron Rumble not available for purchase
body: Has anyone noticed that the skin isn't even in the shop? If you go to the skins tab on Rumble's page you can see the skin there, however you can't buy it. Was just wondering if anyone knows what's up or has any insight on the issue.

replies.body: I agree, i hope they are taking this extra time to fix the skins issues. Well mainly the model's issues
Hi hi! Content isn't always unlocked immediately when content goes live. In this case, it's intended that he isn't available yet, but will be later this patch.
Hi :) I understand everything, but do you know when it will be released? I want to buy it as soon as it is possible :D It is the best skin for my main ;) compliments to the designer.
Ahh, glad you're excited for this guy! Unfortunately, we haven't announced any specific date for his release, just that he'll be coming out in this patch. Shouldn't be too much longer, though~!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ioAGWkZr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-09T15:58:23.827+0000)
>
> Ahh, glad you're excited for this guy! Unfortunately, we haven't announced any specific date for his release, just that he'll be coming out in this patch. Shouldn't be too much longer, though~!

Fix the skin, dont ruin skin with so much potential

What's wrong with it? Personally I would have loved a slightly different voice (although i know this would drive the price way up). It just sounds weird with rumbles base voice-over. Doesn't match the skin at all.
Whatever that date may be, my wallet is ready
